summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TimeFlow SaaS booking platform MVP - Backend APIs work well (91.7% success) but frontend-backend integration is broken due to mixed content security issue

integration_issues.issue: Mixed Content Security Error - Frontend served over HTTPS but making API calls to HTTP endpoints
integration_issues.symptoms: All API requests blocked by browser security policy
integration_issues.browser_error: Mixed Content: The page at 'https://admin-roles-perms.preview.emergentagent.com/admin' was loaded over HTTPS, but requested an insecure XMLHttpRequest endpoint 'http://booking-pro-21.preview.emergentagent.com/api/'

ui_bugs.issue: Server error messages displayed due to failed API calls

passed_tests: Landing page loads correctly with hero section and features
User login flow works with Super Admin credentials
Dashboard loads and user is redirected after login
Navigation menu shows correct items for Super Admin role
Can navigate between dashboard sections (businesses, users, appointments)
Logout functionality works and redirects to home page
Backend API endpoints work correctly (91.7% success rate)
Business and service creation APIs functional
Public endpoints accessible for booking system
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Mixed Content Security Error - The frontend is served over HTTPS but making API calls to HTTP endpoints, causing all dashboard functionality to fail. Environment variable configuration or axios defaults need to be corrected to ensure all API calls use HTTPS protocol.
